marga anka 170,athurugiriya-pitakotuwa bas rathaya,maha warusawe hawasa 5.45ta withara baththaramulla pradeshaya pahu karanawa.karyayalayaka wada nokalath puruwe pinakata mamath ee bas rathaye magiyek eda,ara ihala sadahan karapu siyaluma athdakim athwndina.age pramane nisa kondosthara saho mawa issarahata yawanne na.thawa dennek danna puluwanne uuta ethakota.mamath ithin pemmullata aasannawa polla allan innawa,bas eke.mata wada asun 3-4 withara riyaduru asuna desata wenna yabada asun dekaka adi allagana inna gahanu lamayek bohoma apahasuwen wage hasirenawa.welawakata eheta meheta wemin,nalala rali ganwamin ha wenath iriyawu walin yam apahasuthawak pilibadawa aya wata pita sitinnanta danagannata salassuwa.ayata pitupasin awurudu 40 pamana ayek mada polla allagana anith atha nidahase bimata ellagana ayawa therapanawa.hmm....hithuwa hari oya....jaksan kenek....jaksangen ehatath giya wanacharayek.aya kihipa witak hari ohu desa rawa baluwada ohu mukuth nodanna shanthuwarayek wage paduwe thamange wadi karagana yanawa.aya inna thanin wena thanakata yanna uthsaha karath inna senaga kandarawa eekata idak dunne na.thalahena pradeshayedi athak nidahas karagath aya ee athin ema pudgalayage kammula athagawa,wegayen.eeth ekkama monawado wegayen kiyanna aya uthsaha gaththath ayage wachana patali kathakaraganna baruwa aya ikibindinna patangaththa.asala asune siti ayaku thama asuna ayata dun heyin ehi indagath aya ikibindiminma idiripasa asunata nambauruwuna.

demahal ha themahal godanagili paddhathiyakin da samanwitha wu mehi pusthakala, pariganaka eekaka, shrawya drushya eekakaya, kridapitiya, sellam midula, buddha mandiraya, guru niwasaya yana siyalu angayan gen sawibala ganwi atha.pasala panthi kamarayata sima nowuna prayogika athdakim athi nawa lowath samanga sruju lesama ganudenu kala haki daruweku nirmanaya kirimehi niyali sitima ada adhyapanaya labana ha heta adhyapanayata ayanna kiyawana daruwange wasanawaki.wathman widuhalpathi ajith priyantha waduge mahathage dadi adhishtanaya matha giya wasare dida 31.7% shishyathwa wibhagaya prathipala penwimata di.es. senanayaka widyalaya samath wu athara, 2014 wibhagaya sandaha wu adhyapana kriyawaliya me wana wita sarthakawa kriyawata nanwa atha.mawupiyange dayakathwayada gurumandalaye kapawimada anuwa ee adhishtanaya ha ilakkaya langa kara ganima apahasu nowanu atha.uthuru mada palath pradhana amathya es.em. ranjith samarakon mahathage saha adhyapana amathya ke. ech. nandasena mahathagen nomada sahaya ha owunage kapawimada anagatha daruparapure unnathiyata pituwahalak wana bawada widuhalpathi ajith priyantha mahatha pawasayi.bahira balapam walin thorawa adhyapana katayuththe niyalimata awashya pasubima udawi thibima kerehi da amathiwaraya siya pranamaya puda kala bawa ajith priyantha mahatha wadiduratath pawasiya.nawa lowata uchitha ha eeta muhunadiya haki daruwaku nirmanaya kirima wenuwen pasala thula wishaya bahira kriyakarakam rasak da kriyathmakaya.udaya raswima ha agayim katayuthu, parisara kamituwa, ingrisi ha demala bhasha wadasatahan, muddara samaja, ches kridawata lamun puhunu kirima, shishya upadeshanaya, kuda mithuri wada satahana, shishya subasadhanaya, wyapruthi kamituwa, saundarya nirmana kusalatha sanwardhana wadasatahana, shrawya drushya eekakaye nawa wadasatahan, danuma minuma wadasatahan ha krida katayuthu da mul thanak gani.wisheshayen sama daruwakuma thaman adahana aagama kerehi wadi nambauruwak dakwima kerehi owun huru kirima ha eeta awashya pasubima sakas karadima mema pasalehi daknata athi thawath ek suwisheshathwayaki.meki aramunu osse gaman karana mema widyaliya widuhalpathiwaraya pradhana guru mandulla warthamanaya wana wita anuradhapura nagaraye didulana pasala bawata di.es.
